description: Data that locates something relative to the Earth, usually a somewhat fixed location.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the location.

lat.description: The WGS84 latitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees), expressed as numerator/denominator.

long.description: The WGS84 longitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees), expressed as numerator/denominator.

alt.description: The WGS84 altitude (decimal meters above the local reference ellipsoid), expressed as numerator/denominator.

mappableAddress.description: A textual address that can be mapped using mapping software.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the location.
